website_summaries.verdict: Recognizable and iconic Blundstone Chelsea style women's boot.
pros: 100% leather with anatomically shaped removable footbed
Versatile look allows you to wear them all year long
cons: Could feel snug early in break in period

customer_reviews.title: Not for pointy, narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I have long narrow feet and these shoes just did not fit right. The shoe has a wide, round toe box that didn't seem to work with my natural foot shape. It wasn't painful, but I knew it would become uncomfortable after a day's worth of wear. I also noticed that there was no arch support. Very well made shoe, just not for me. This shoe would work well for someone with wide feet!
customer_reviews.author: Maria V.

customer_reviews.title: Boot love!
customer_reviews.text: All the college girls in Seattle seem to be wearing these. I wear them to work (teaching) on rainy and cold days in the Bay Area of California. So far: every day for 3 months straight. They're still hard to get on because the leather around the top of the foot/lower leg is stiff. But I LOVE them! Stylish boots with support, these boots are roomy for my wide foot and I can wear them all day- with a skirt, dress pants, and jeans. Fashion meets function.
customer_reviews.author: Another humble opinion...

customer_reviews.title: Negative reviews are right
customer_reviews.text: I thought the reviews about the small, non-stretchy opening wouldn't apply to me, because I have narrow feet and small ankles. I struggled for over 10 minutes just to get the boots on. It was painful. It would be impossible to wear anything but the thinnest of socks with these. Once I did get them on, I had to struggle to get out of them. Who has time to struggle to put their shoes and off? I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Observer

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock of the Winter
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and so comfortable. It took a week or two to break into them. As in, they were hard to get on and off the first few weeks and I had to wear a band-aid behind my ankle until they stopped rubbing. That is true with any leather boots I find. Now they are so easy to wear it feels like the Birkenstock of the Winter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get my foot in the boot; it’s just too tight in the opening and I think the design is bad. I mean the shoe looks cute but if I had to pull my foot into these using the tab I would end up ripping it off. If they were fifty bucks fine but at nearly two hundred forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Geek ltd

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size up! Otherwise great boot
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of these boots. The first pair I ordered in my normal size were much too small -- I felt myself getting a blister after trying them on around the house. After getting a replacement a half size bigger than what I usually order (in the US), they fit perfectly, are comfortable, and are a great boot that looks a little fancier than a normal rain or snow/hiking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost the perfect boot
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots - they are durable, truly waterproof, I feel safe on slippery terrain, can wear as every day shoe. The one BIG downside is they are very difficult to get on and off. The leather is tight so getting your foot through the tight ankle part requires serious effort - taking them off is even harder. It does get easier over time as the shoes stretch out but big design flaw for me.
customer_reviews.author: dianamc94

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! Best pair pf boots I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I have lots and lots of boots but these are by far the best boots I have ever owned. I ride horses and do all kinds of things around town. They are tight to get on so I bought a pair of boots pulls (hooks) and solved the problem. Wish I could buy one in every color. These are my foot wear for Dress up or play. Buy them no worries!
customer_reviews.author: boss

customer_reviews.title: Fits large but tight around the ankle.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and make. Really hard to put in and take off at least now when they are new. The boot is pretty wide inside and fits large. I would have liked 1/2 size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Oana

customer_reviews.title: You need these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots! The first pair of boots ever that didn't need 'breaking in' before wearing them for several hours. Very comfortable, nice color, a really good purchase. Most comfortable for me with a pair of wool socks.
customer_reviews.author: Olive girl

customer_reviews.title: Typically struggle to find shoes but this is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a narrow foot and also flat footed. She does a lot of walking around NYC and she LOVES this boot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot, ankle opening very tight though
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these for all day comfort and durability. My only complaint is the ankle is very tight, even broken in. If you have large ankles or wear thick socks it can be very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Dodge

customer_reviews.title: These boots are so comfortable I work at a golf course and these boots ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so comfortable I work at a golf course and these boots have been the best my feet have had on in a long time. Love them
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: These boots are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about these boots. They fit great, the color is awesome - unique but understated. Can wear them all day in comfort. I wanted to treat myself to supportive, quality footwear, and these fit the bill. You will not regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela N.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Took a week to break them in
customer_reviews.text: These boots were ordered for my daughter. Beautiful! Took a week to break them in. Hurt her ankles initially. Better now. We all love them!
customer_reviews.author: waterjewel

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get on and off at first but I'm certain with wear they will be fine
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Not too bulky and fits nicely with thick/wool socks
customer_reviews.author: Miranda H.

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof barn boots
customer_reviews.text: hard to break in but worth it once they are
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I am so far very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The sizing fit well, but I am almost always a size 8. I am so far very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots but a Little Tight for Wider Feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boot a few days ago, and I love them. I am a US size 7 but I sized up to a US 7.5 or AUS 4.5 for these boots. They go with a variety of different ohtfits and are perfect for our climate in the PNW. My only beef with them so far is that they can be difficult to get on and off and they are more narrow than I expected. I have slightly wider feet and they squeeze my mid foot slightly which is uncomfortable. Right now I cannot wear thick socks with them. Other than that- great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Flint

product_meta.title: Blundstone Women's 1352 Chelsea Boot
product_meta.description: A more feminine version of the iconic blundstone chelsea
feature_bullets: Poron xrd shock protection in heel-strike zone
Tpu outsole and pu midsole for longer wear and comfort
